ComicInfo.Title: Luba Again; Sergio Rocks; Guadalupe; The Fortunato Files; And So...; The Tao of Doralis
ComicInfo.Summary:
Luba, Fritz, Pipo and Boots go to an adult costumed nightclub where they encounter Sergio.
Guadalupe ponders her insecurities.
Fortunato's supposed true back story as told by Pipo.
What happened after Doralis came out in her children's TV show.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:01:39. [Issue ID 627959]
